item.title: Creating a simple blog with HUGO
item.description: One of the simplest ways to create a blog nowadays is by using a static site generator. HUGO is an open-source, fast, and flexible static site generator that can be used with almost no coding skills. In this post, we’ll focus on creating a simple blog we can host on github pages in just a few steps. Installation: Please install GIT by clicking here if you still don’t have it. To install HUGO compiler just follow the below step:
